rect.style: stroke-width: 5px; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); paint-order: fill; fill: rgb(8, 0, 255);

path.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 5px; paint-order: fill; fill-rule: nonzero; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255);

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 77px; white-space: pre;
